results.Title: Superman
results.Writer: Jerry Siegel (creator: Superman), Joe Shuster (creator: Superman), Mario Puzo (story), Mario Puzo (screenplay), David Newman (screenplay), Leslie Newman (screenplay), Robert Benton (screenplay)
results.Actors: Marlon Brando, Gene Hackman, Christopher Reeve, Ned Beatty
results.Plot: An alien orphan is sent from his dying planet to Earth, where he grows up to become his adoptive home's first and greatest superhero.
results.Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 15 wins & 17 nominations.

results.Title: Apocalypse Now
results.Writer: John Milius, Francis Ford Coppola, Michael Herr (narration)
results.Actors: Marlon Brando, Martin Sheen, Robert Duvall, Frederic Forrest
results.Plot: During the Vietnam War, Captain Willard is sent on a dangerous mission into Cambodia to assassinate a renegade colonel who has set himself up as a god among a local tribe.

results.Plot: The lives of two mob hit men, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

results.Title: Inferno
results.Actors: Leigh McCloskey, Irene Miracle, Eleonora Giorgi, Daria Nicolodi
results.Plot: An American college student in Rome and his sister in New York investigate a series of killings in both locations where their resident addresses are the domain of two covens of witches.
